extendedInfo.description: Fountain that Glitters is a Live Wallpaper.After you have downloaded and installed it,  You need in order to set it  as a Live Wallpaper:- go to your home screen;- press the menu button on your device;- select "Wallpaper";- select "Live Wallpapers";- search and select for this Live Wallpaper"- select "Settings" to see the settings or select "Set wallpaper" to activate it.System Requirement:any phone that came with Android OS 2.0 or later should work fine. Anything that came with 1.5 / 1.6 may have problemsTags: Live wallpapers Blue WHite water Fountain that Glitters Live Wallpaper

reviews.title: Very Pretty
reviews.comment: Lovely glittering water fountain in blue! Simple, yet very pretty ! Best at slow frame rate setting !
reviews.author: Tamara Duquette

reviews.title: Rinky roy
reviews.comment: Yes, I think this is innovative and one of the five star wallpaper.
reviews.author: A Google User
